mapper.update: update l_company set companyid=companyid ,companycode=#{companycode} ,companyname=#{companyname} ,companytypeid=#{companytypeid} ,companynatureid=#{companynatureid} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,comaddress=#{comaddress} ,postalcode=#{postalcode} ,artificialperson=#{artificialperson} ,artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} ,linkman=#{linkman} ,linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} ,telnumber=#{telnumber} ,faxnumber=#{faxnumber} ,comurl=#{comurl} ,bankname=#{bankname} ,bankaccno=#{bankaccno} ,remark=#{remark} ,creditcode=#{creditcode} ,taxregno=#{taxregno} ,taxnature=#{taxnature} ,businessrep=#{businessrep} ,businessscope=#{businessscope} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} where companyid=#{companyid}

update l_company set companyid=companyid ,companycode=#{companycode} ,companyname=#{companyname} ,companytypeid=#{companytypeid} ,companynatureid=#{companynatureid} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,comaddress=#{comaddress} ,postalcode=#{postalcode} ,artificialperson=#{artificialperson} ,artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} ,linkman=#{linkman} ,linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} ,telnumber=#{telnumber} ,faxnumber=#{faxnumber} ,comurl=#{comurl} ,bankname=#{bankname} ,bankaccno=#{bankaccno} ,remark=#{remark} ,creditcode=#{creditcode} ,taxregno=#{taxregno} ,taxnature=#{taxnature} ,businessrep=#{businessrep} ,businessscope=#{businessscope} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} where 1=1 and companyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and companyid =#{Where_Id} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and companycode=#{Where_companycode} and companyname=#{Where_companyname} and companytypeid=#{Where_companytypeid} and companynatureid=#{Where_companynatureid} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and comaddress=#{Where_comaddress} and postalcode=#{Where_postalcode} and artificialperson=#{Where_artificialperson} and artificialidcard=#{Where_artificialidcard} and linkman=#{Where_linkman} and linkmanidcard=#{Where_linkmanidcard} and telnumber=#{Where_telnumber} and faxnumber=#{Where_faxnumber} and comurl=#{Where_comurl} and bankname=#{Where_bankname} and bankaccno=#{Where_bankaccno} and remark=#{Where_remark} and creditcode=#{Where_creditcode} and taxregno=#{Where_taxregno} and taxnature=#{Where_taxnature} and businessrep=#{Where_businessrep} and businessscope=#{Where_businessscope} and longitude=#{Where_longitude} and latitude=#{Where_latitude} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime}

select count(*) from l_company t where 1=1 and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.companyid!=#{NoId} and t.companycode=#{companycode} and t.companyname=#{companyname} and t.companytypeid=#{companytypeid} and t.companynatureid=#{companynatureid} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.comaddress=#{comaddress} and t.postalcode=#{postalcode} and t.artificialperson=#{artificialperson} and t.artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} and t.linkman=#{linkman} and t.linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} and t.telnumber=#{telnumber} and t.faxnumber=#{faxnumber} and t.comurl=#{comurl} and t.bankname=#{bankname} and t.bankaccno=#{bankaccno} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.creditcode=#{creditcode} and t.taxregno=#{taxregno} and t.taxnature=#{taxnature} and t.businessrep=#{businessrep} and t.businessscope=#{businessscope} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
